body.p: The form of the employee benefit does not determine whether it is provided in exchange for service or in exchange for termination of the employee’s employment. Termination benefits are typically lump sum payments, but sometimes also include:

li.p: enhancement of post‑employment benefits, either indirectly through an employee benefit plan or directly.
